alert.note: Alert for Tripp (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 4:42PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Tripp County through 615 PM CDT... At 541 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles south of Earling Hill to 8 miles north of Dallas. Movement was west at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Winner and Ideal South Housing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
